articles.title: Microsoft hides "official" workaround for installing Windows 11 on older PCs - TechSpot
articles.description: When Windows 11 launched in 2021, Microsoft provided an official method for installing the operating system on devices that didn't meet its stringent hardware requirements. However, four...
articles.content: In context: Microsoft has been routinely changing its online support articles about Windows 11. The "ways to install" the operating system have recently been revised, and there are now no "official" … [+2248 chars]
